newsitem.title: Algeria: Port conditions update - Algeria - Lloyds Shipping.
newsitem.headline: Port conditions update - Algeria - Lloyds Shipping.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --
ALGIERS, Dec 15 -- During the last two weeks, eight to 10 vessels reported at anchorage awaiting berths. Average time on roads about two to three days.
